item.title: Update: Coroner Calls Inquest | The Boy in the Water
item.description: Podcast Description We reveal an important update from the coroner’s office, plus a radio interview with Melanie Reid on The Detail. Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information. Transcript

item.title: Welcome to The Boy in the Water | The Boy in the Water
item.description: Podcast Description Newsroom’s electrifying new podcast takes you inside a small town harbouring a big mystery. After the lifeless body of three-year-old Lachie Jones is found floating in an oxidation pond in the Southland town of Gore, police rule his death a tragic accident. But nothing is what it seems. Newsroom’s investigations editor Melanie Reid has spent three years covering this case, revealing multiple flaws in the police investigation and uncovering new evidence that casts serious doubt about the circumstances surrounding Lachie’s death.
